document.full_text: the worst u.s. coal mine accident in four decades, in which 29 miners died, was "man-made" and could have been avoided if mine owner massey energy co had followed basic safety measures, an independent investigation concluded on thursday.
document.title: probe blames massey for mine blast that killed 29
lines_and_colors: the worst u.s. coal mine accident in four decades, in which 29 miners died, was "man-made" and could have been avoided if mine owner massey energy co had followed basic safety measures, an independent investigation concluded on thursday.
